coreAttributes.name: female chastity piercing
coreAttributes.description: An unobtrusive female chastity device that requires piercings to put in place and enchanted to restore the 'purity' of those who lack restraint.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(install)] the chastity device onto [npc.her] [npc.pussy+]. #IF (npc.hasHymen()) #THEN
Sensing [npc.namePos] purity the Chasity Piercing grants you a sense of peace and sanctity. #ELSE
Sensing [npc.namePos] lack of restraint the Chastity Piercing sets about restoring [npc.her] 'purity'...
[#npc.setHymen(1)] #ENDIF
